meanings.definition: A journey or expedition, especially in Africa, for hunting or exploring.
meanings.sent1: During the safari, we saw many wild animals in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent2: The family went on a safari to observe lions and elephants.
meanings.sent3: The safari turned into a thrilling adventure when we encountered a curious elephant.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the dense jungle on the safari felt like embarking on a grand quest.
meanings.sent5: The safari guide's stories made the expedition come alive in our minds.

meanings.definition: A trip or tour for observing wildlife in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent1: On the safari, we spotted zebras grazing peacefully in the savanna.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists enjoy going on a safari to see giraffes and rhinos up close.
meanings.sent3: During the safari, a mischievous monkey stole a banana from our picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The safari experience was like stepping into a nature documentary.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset painted a beautiful backdrop for our safari adventure.

meanings.definition: A type of web browser developed by Apple Inc. for use on their devices.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using Safari as my web browser on the iPad.
meanings.sent2: The Safari browser offers a seamless browsing experience on Apple devices.
meanings.sent3: Trying to open multiple tabs on Safari can sometimes slow down the device.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through websites on Safari feels smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The Safari logo on my iPhone always reminds me of exploring the internet.
